column4: followd these instructions up to the insert the broadcom wl module http://www.broadcom.com/docs/linux_sta/README.txt
download NDISwrapper if you are in ubuntu
and open the inf file with the gui
i need to apply the patch
if you are in ubuntu NDISwrapper is the gui for interfacing xp wifi drivers
google ndiswrapper and download debian package
or upgrade-manager -d ubuntu jaunty has drivers already
